10.1.hd_quote: The correct behavior is simply to accept one's place.
10.1.behavioral_axis: Accepts their place in the hierarchy without asserting ego, moving comfortably between princes and outcasts with equal ease.
10.1.shadow_axis: Becomes oversensitive with hurt feelings when others challenge their behavior, knowing genetically their actions are correct but wounded by outside pressure.
10.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

10.2.hd_quote: Withdraw rather than accept conditioning away from what is your nature.
10.2.behavioral_axis: Withdraws from negative forces and conditioning to preserve independent behavior, waiting in natural isolation until called out by others who recognize their gifts.
10.2.shadow_axis: Either becomes an angry exile who resents withdrawal, or confuses being pulled out with genuine love, allowing others to motivate and condition their nature.
10.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

10.3.hd_quote: That trial and error in behavior can be something of enormous value to humanity.
10.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with behavior through trial-and-error, attracting attention as they discover what works through discovering what doesn't, potentially bringing mutation through their resistance.
10.3.shadow_axis: Either pursues martyrdom for personal attention and aggrandizement, or becomes thin-skinned and reactive, unable to sustain their experimental nature under criticism.
10.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

10.4.hd_quote: The acceptance of norms until a successful transformation can be engendered.
10.4.behavioral_axis: Holds steady in current behavioral patterns until the right opportunity arrives to externalize their nature, never abandoning stability prematurely.
10.4.shadow_axis: Treats opportunism as a mental game or speculation, altering behavior patterns to chase opportunities without the motor force to actually manifest transformation.
10.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

10.5.hd_quote: Principled behavior which directly challenges tradition.
10.5.behavioral_axis: Holds the projection field for society's need to mutate behavioral norms, challenging the underlying framework of tradition rather than attacking individual surface behavior.
10.5.shadow_axis: Makes challenges personal and attacks individual behavior directly, getting burned at the stake for confronting surface expressions rather than systemic tradition.
10.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

10.6.hd_quote: The perfect expression of the norms through action rather than words.
10.6.behavioral_axis: Points out correct behavior to others through recognition and wisdom, knowing deeply what right action looks like even when unable to perfectly embody it themselves.
10.6.shadow_axis: Becomes hypocritical with 'do as I say not as I do' positioning, or retreats to the roof refusing to be seen because they suffer from their own behavioral inconsistencies.
10.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
